give up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to stop doing something, especially something that you do regularly
give up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Darren has decided to give up football at the end of this season.
She gave up her job and started writing poetry.
I gave up going to the theatre when I moved out of London.
Why don’t you give up smoking?
give up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to stop trying to do something
give up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: We spent half an hour looking for the keys, but eventually gave up and went home.
I give up. What’s the answer?
You shouldn’t give up so easily.
The ground was too hard to dig so I gave it up as a bad job (=stopped trying because success seemed unlikely).
I gave up trying to persuade him to continue with his studies.
She has still not given up the search.
give up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to allow yourself or someone else to be caught by the police or enemy soldiers
give up.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The siege ended peacefully after the gunman gave himself up.
In the end, his family gave him up to the police.
give up.translation[0].definitions[3].de: to use some of your time to do a particular thing
give up.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: I don’t mind giving up a couple of hours a week to deal with correspondence.
give up.translation[0].definitions[4].de: to give something that is yours to someone else
give up.translation[0].definitions[4].ex: The family refused to give up any of their land.
She was put under tremendous pressure to give the baby up.
I would always give my seat up to an elderly person on the bus.
give up.translation[0].definitions[5].de: to end a romantic relationship with someone, even though you do not really want to
give up.translation[0].definitions[5].ex: I knew deep down that I should give him up.
give up.translation[0].definitions[6].de: to believe that someone is dead and stop looking for them
give up.translation[0].definitions[6].ex: The ship sank and the crew were given up for dead.
give up.translation[0].definitions[7].de: used to ask people to applaud someone
